name: dmcoeq

stmt.origin: syl(wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), wceq(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(c1)), wss(crn(c1), cdm(c0)))
stmt.pretty: syl(dom(c0)= ran(c1), dom((c0 ∘ c1))= dom(c1), ran(c1)⊆ dom(c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), wceq(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(c1)))
-| wi(wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), wss(crn(c1), cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wss(crn(c1), cdm(c0)), wceq(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (dom(c0)= ran(c1)→ dom((c0 ∘ c1))= dom(c1))
⊣ (dom(c0)= ran(c1)→ ran(c1)⊆ dom(c0))
⊣ (ran(c1)⊆ dom(c0)→ dom((c0 ∘ c1))= dom(c1))

⊣ (ran(c1)⊆ dom(c0)→ dom((c0 ∘ c1))= dom(c1))

cumulated.pretty:
